3P2N.F.summary: Trillion Energy International Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an oil and gas exploration, and production company in Bulgaria and Turkey. It owns oil and gas producing assets in Turkey; and a coal bed methane exploration license in Bulgaria. The company was formerly known as Park Place Energy Inc. and changed its name to Trillion Energy International Inc. in April 2019. Trillion Energy International Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

5THA.F.summary: TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, constructs terminal buildings, and manages and operates terminals or airports in Turkey, Georgia, Tunisia, Macedonia, Latvia, Oman, Spain, Saudi Arabia, and internationally. It operates through Terminal Operations, Catering Operations, Duty Free Operations, Ground Handling and Bus Operations, and Other segments. The Terminal Operations segment operates terminal buildings, car parks, and general aviation terminals. This segment also engages in the ground handling operations, as well as operation of parking-apron-taxi ways. The Catering Operations segment manages food and beverage operations of the terminal for the passengers and the terminal personnel. The Duty Free Operations segment sells duty free goods for the international arriving and departing passengers. The Ground Handling and Bus Operations segment offers traffic, ramp, flight operation, cargo, and various other ground handling services for domestic and international flights; and operates buses. The Other segment provides lounge, IT, security and education, and airline taxi services. The company also provides software and system services. The company was formerly known as Tepe Akfen Vie Yatirim Yapim ve Isletme A.S. and changed its name to TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. in August 2006. TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

The company produces and sells beer and malt, and carbonated and non-carbonated beverages, as well as passenger and commercial vehicles; imports, distributes, markets, and rents motor vehicles; and offers generators, and spares and component parts. It is also involved in the production of industrial engines; sale of tractors; production of writing instruments; distribution of other imported stationery products; arrangement of travelling and organization facilities; and provision of IT, internet, and e-commerce services. In addition, the company engages in the restaurant management; whole sale and retail sale of electricity; insurance agency; and production, distribution, and transmission of electricity businesses. AKB2.F.summary: Akbank T.A.S., together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Turkey and internationally. It operates through three segments: Retail Banking; Commercial Banking, SME Banking, Corporate-Investment and Private Banking; and Treasury. The company's retail banking services comprise deposit accounts, retail loans, commercial installment loans, credit cards, insurance products, and asset management services, as well as bank cards, investment funds trading, automatic payment, foreign currency trading, safe deposit box rental, cheques, money transfer, investment banking, and telephone and Internet banking. It also offers services to large, medium, and small size corporate and commercial customers that include Turkish Lira (TL) and foreign currency denominated working capital loans, foreign trade financing, derivative instruments for hedging purposes of foreign currency and interest risk, letters of credit, foreign currency trading, corporate finance, and deposit and cash management services, as well as project finance loans; and timely and permanent solutions for corporate customers' working capital management, delivering cash management services based on customers' requests that include collection and payment services and liquidity and information management. In addition, the company engages in treasury activities consisting of TL and foreign currency spot and forward transactions, treasury and government bonds, Eurobonds, and private sector bond transactions, as well as derivative trading activities; and marketing and pricing activities related treasury products. Further, it provides bancassurance, asset management, and financial leasing services, as well as offers payment services and issues electronic money. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 770 branches, as well as approximately 5,100 ATMs and 600,000 POS terminals. Akbank T.A.S. was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

Akfen REIT's core business is to invest in real estate-based capital markets instruments and to create and develop a real estate portfolio. Specialized in the development and construction of middle market hotel projects, Akfen REIT develops city hotel projects under Ibis Hotel and Novotel brands through a strategic cooperation with Accor, Europe's largest international hotel operator chain. Akfen REIT's hotels currently in operation include Ibis and Novotel in Istanbul; Ibis in Esenyurt; Ibis in Ankara; Ibis in Eskisehir; Novotel in Trabzon; Ibis and Novotel in Kayseri; Ibis and Novotel in Gaziantep; Ibis in Bursa; Ibis in Adana; Ibis in Izmir; Ibis in Yaroslavl, Russia; Ibis in Samara, Russia; Ibis in Kaliningrad, Russia, Ibis in Moscow, Russia, the five-star Merit Park Hotel in TRNC, Novotel in KarakÃ¶y and Ibis in Tuzla. The Company has a portfolio of 20 hotels in total.

AKGRT.IS.summary: Aksigorta A.S. provides various non-life insurance products and services to retail and corporate customers in Turkey. It offers motor vehicle, motor third party liability, fire, marine, accident, personal accident, traffic, home and content, travel, engineering, agriculture, and health insurance products. The company provides its products through branches, independent agencies, brokers, and contracted institutions. Aksigorta A.S. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

Akmerkez Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

AKSA.IS.summary: Aksa Akrilik Kimya Sanayii A.S., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures textiles and chemicals products in Turkey and internationally. It operates through three segments: Fibers, Energy, and Other. The company offers textile fibers, outdoor fibers, acrylic filament yarns, modacrylic fibers, and industrial fibers for knitting and hand knitting, carpet, home textile and upholstery, toy/hi-pile products, UV resistant, technical application, and protective garments. It also provides raw and auxiliary materials, as well as intermediate substances; artificial, synthetic, and natural fibers, as well as carbon fibers, and filament and polymers; and equipment, machinery, and spare parts used in the production, processing, and storage activity, as well as engages in the marketing and trading activity. In addition, the company generates and sells electricity; and rents real estate properties. It imports and exports its products to domestic, foreign, and international branches. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Yalova, Turkey.

Further, it operates hotels, sports centers, spa centers, and movie theaters; publishes Hillsider quarterly magazine; constructs, manages, and operates commercial and residential buildings; and designs and offers satellite towns. Additonally, the company offers marketing of industrial products and after sales services; and tools related to real estates. It also engages in supply of water and cleaning of lake projects; and subway construction, copper facility, and road construction projects, as well as construction and installation works. Alarko Holding A.S. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ARD Grup Bilisim Teknolojileri A.S. is a subsidiary of Ard Grup Holding Anonim Sirketi.

ARENA.IS.long_name: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ARENA.IS.summary: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the distribution of technology products in Turkey. It offers desktops, notebooks, printers, supplies, monitors, projections, memory cards, USB flash drives, SSDs, external and internal disc, DVD RWs, motherboards, graphic cards, workstations, thin client computers, wireless networks and ADSL, PC memory products, and accessories. The company also offers Bulutum.com, an end-to-end cloud services platform with pre-sales and post-sales technical support, training, and payment facilities that helps business partners to create business opportunities at software and managed services; Pencere.com, a communication and interaction portal; Paynet that provides payment, collection, and financial solutions to B2B, B2B2C, and B2C companies in various sectors, such as construction materials, marine materials, paint, health equipment, musical instruments, machinery, spare automotive parts, and others; and financial solutions. In addition, it provides Tencer-e.com, a communication and interaction portal that manages technical services and current account operations; and automation and IOT services. Further, the company is involved in the wholesale trading of mobile phones and other mobile devices; and online electronics retail and marketplace businesses. Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ARMDA.IS.long_name: Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ARMDA.IS.summary: Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a distributor in the information technology sector in Turkey. It offers IT products and solutions to end users through business partners. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Aptec Holdings Limited.

ARSAN.IS.long_name: Arsan Tekstil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
ARSAN.IS.summary: Arsan Tekstil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells yarns in Turkey. It offers open-end, carded ring, and combed yarns of cotton; acrylic, cotton/acrylic, and cotton/polyester; and corespun, compact, and regenerated fiber yarns. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Kahramanmaras, Turkey.

ARZUM.IS.long_name: Arzum Elektrikli Ev Aletleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ARZUM.IS.summary: Arzum Elektrikli Ev Aletleri San. ve Tic. AS engages in the manufacture and supply of household appliances for households worldwide. It offers food preparation, cooking, frying, beverage preparation, cleaning, personal care, iron, baby products, day gifts, and accessories. The company sells its products through authorized retail points. Arzum Elektrikli Ev Aletleri San. ve Tic. AS was formerly known as Guney Ithalat Kollektif Sirketi. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey with additional offices in Hong Kong and Turkey.

ASELS.IS.long_name: Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
ASELS.IS.summary: Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the research, development, engineering, production, testing, assembly, integration, sale, consultancy, and trading of software, equipment, system, tools, material, and platforms. The company operates through five divisions: Communication and Information Technologies; Radar, Electronic Warfare and Intelligence Systems; Defense Systems Technologies; Microelectronics, Guidance & Electro-Optics; and Transportation, Security, Energy & Automation Systems. It offers communication systems, military communication systems, public safety communication systems, mobile communication systems, information technology systems, space technologies, satellite ground systems, satellite payloads, and encryption and information security systems. The company is also involved in the design, development, and integration of naval and naval combat systems of underwater and surface platforms; air and missile defense systems; land systems, main battle tank systems, and fire control systems, as well as command control communication and computer systems; and weapon and weapon fire control systems. In addition, it manufactures and develops electro-optic systems, guidance and unmanned systems, and avionics systems; and transportation systems, security systems, and energy systems, as well as traffic, automation, and medical systems. Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi offers its products and services for army, navy, air force, and aerospace applications in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey. Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Turkish Armed Forces Foundation.

ASUZU.IS.long_name: Anadolu Isuzu Otomotiv Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ASUZU.IS.summary: Anadolu Isuzu Otomotiv Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells commercial vehicles in Turkey. The company offers light and heavy duty trucks, midi buses, buses, and pick-up vehicles. It also engages in the sale of spare parts for commercial vehicles. The company also exports commercial vehicles to Western Europe, Asia, and South America. Anadolu Isuzu Otomotiv Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ATAGY.IS.summary: Ata Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. operates in REIT sector in Turkey. The company focuses on commercial real estate valuables and projects. Its projects include real estate, retail, office, and logistics. Ata Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. was founded in 1997 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ATEKS.IS.summary: Akin Tekstil Anonim Sirketi produces and sells fabrics in Turkey and internationally. It also offers technical yarns and textiles. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ATLAS.IS.long_name: Atlas Menkul Kiymetler Yatirim Ortakligi A.S.
ATLAS.IS.summary: Atlas Menkul Kiymetler Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. engages in the portfolio management activities related to securities traded on national and international exchanges. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ATSYH.IS.summary: Atlantis Yatirim Holding A.S. engages in the financial investments and portfolio management activities in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Atlantis Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. and changed its name to Atlantis Yatirim Holding A.S. in July 2012. Atlantis Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

AVGYO.IS.long_name: Avrasya Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi
AVGYO.IS.summary: Avrasya Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi operates in the real estate investment field in Turkey and Georgia. The company was formerly known as Avrasya Menkul Kiymetler Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. and changed its name to Avrasya Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi in October 2010. Avrasya Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1994 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

AVHOL.IS.summary: Avrupa Yatirim Holding A.S. invests in health, energy, construction, and software sectors in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Baysan Trafo Radyatorleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Avrupa Yatirim Holding A.S. in December 2014. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Avrupa Yatirim Holding A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Alsancak Health Services Trade A.S.

AVISA.IS.summary: AvivaSA Emeklilik ve Hayat A.S. engages in the pension and life insurance business primarily in Turkey. It operates through Life Protection, Life Savings, Personal Accident, and Pension segments. The Life Protection segment offers credit-linked life and non-credit-linked life policies, such as term life, return of premium, critical illness, and unemployment. The Life Savings segment offers products, which are written for a contract period. The Personal Accident segment provides coverage against disability, death, and medical expenses due to accident. The Pension segment offers a range of individual and corporate pension plans. The company was founded in 1941 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

AVOD.IS.long_name: A.V.O.D. Kurutulmus Gida ve Tarim Ürünleri A.S.
AVOD.IS.summary: A.V.O.D. Kurutulmus Gida ve Tarim ÃrÃ¼nleri A.S. provides dried vegetables and derivatives, and vegetable based convenience foods under the Farmer`s Choice brand name in Turkey. Its products include sun dried tomatoes, oven semi dried tomatoes, sauces and bruschettas, fermented vegetables and grilled products, and grilled vegetables. The company serves hotels, restaurants, and the catering industry, as well as retail chains. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

AVTUR.IS.long_name: Avrasya Petrol ve Turistik Tesisler Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi
AVTUR.IS.summary: Avrasya Petrol ve Turistik Tesisler Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi engages in purchasing, selling, importing, and exporting petroleum and petroleum products, fuel oil, diesel oil, LPG, and liquid fuel in Turkey. The company operates through Facility Leasing and Hotel Management segments. It is also involved in purchasing, selling, and leasing movable and immovable properties and machinery fixtures. The company was formerly known as Merkez B Tipi Menkul Kiymetler Yatirim Ortakligi AS and changed its name to Avrasya Petrol ve Turistik Tesisler Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi in January 2011. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

AYCES.IS.long_name: Altin Yunus Çesme Turistik Tesisler A.S.
AYCES.IS.summary: Altin Yunus Ãesme Turistik Tesisler A.S. operates a hotel in Turkey. Its facilities and amenities cover meeting and conference, bar and restaurant, spa, wedding and banquet, catering, and outdoor meetings and events. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. Altin Yunus Ãesme Turistik Tesisler A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding AS.

AYDEM.IS.summary: Aydem Yenilenebilir Enerji A.S. operates as a renewable energy company in Turkey. It operates hydroelectric, wind, geothermal, and biogas power plants with a capacity of 1,020 megawatts. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Merkezefendi, Turkey.

AYEN.IS.summary: Ayen Enerji A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, distribution, and trade of electricity in Turkey and internationally. Its electricity generation include 591.944.352 kWh electricity from hydroelectric, and 256.706.740 kWh electricity wind sources. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Ankara, Turkey. Ayen Enerji A.S. is a subsidiary of Aydiner Insaat AS.

AYES.IS.long_name: Ayes Celik Hasir Ve Cit Sanayi A.S.
AYES.IS.summary: Ayes Celik Hasir Ve Cit Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells wire meshes in Turkey. The company provides Q type and R type wire meshes, fence meshes, and welded and special wire meshes; and coil bar-wire rods, cutted deformed bars, stirrup rebars, and steel rebars. It also offers drawing, wire cutting, butt welding, and mesh bending machines; panel fences; and reinforcement stands. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

AYGAZ.IS.summary: Aygaz A.S., together with its subsidiaries, purchases and delivers liquid petroleum gas (LPG) to retailers for distribution to customers in Turkey. The company operates through three segments: Gas and Petroleum Products, Electricity, and Other. It also manufactures LPG cylinders, LPG tanks, valves, and other supplementary materials; and cylinder-hood sets and hoses, regulators, small cylinder gas devices, barbecues, and patio heaters. In addition, the company distributes LPG autogas, cylinder gas, and bulk gas; markets LPG-operated devices; carries out LPG marine transportation activities; sells carboy water; and trades in fuel and lubricants through its autogas stations. Further, it engages in the delivery of natural gas to customers through pipelines; and liquefied natural gas to customers through cryogenic vehicles. Additionally, it purchases, builds, rents, and operates vessels, which transport crude oil, petroleum products, liquid petroleum gas, natural gas and solid, liquid, and liquefied products; and generates, distributes, and sells electricity. It operates with total 362 MW of installed capacity with eight 265-MW hydroelectric power plants located in Karaman, Samsun, and Mersin, as well as a natural gas cycle plant of 97 MW in Kocaeli. The company provides its services through 2,383 cylinder gas dealers; and 1,718 autogas stations. Aygaz A.S. was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Sisli, Turkey. Aygaz A.S. is a subsidiary of KoÃ§ Holding A.S.

BAGFS.IS.summary: Bagfas Bandirma Gubre Fabrikalari A.S. produces and sells fertilizers in Turkey. It offers chemical fertilizers, which include ammonium nitrate; calcium ammonium nitrate; di ammonium phosphate; AS, sulphur, and sulphur zinc composite fertilizer; sulphur trioxide zinc NPK compound; and special formulations. The company also provides phosphoric and sulfuric acids; and other specialty products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

BAKAB.IS.long_name: Bak Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BAKAB.IS.summary: Bak Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells printed, unprinted, and laminated flexible packaging products for various sectors worldwide. The company offers its packaging products for snack foods, biscuits, sugar and chocolate confectionaries, breads and fresh foods, instant foods and drinks, dried foods and pastas, coffee and tea products, chemicals and hygiene products, and other products. Bak Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1973 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

BALAT.IS.long_name: Balatacilar Balatacilik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
BALAT.IS.summary: Balatacilar Balatacilik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells friction materials in Turkey. The company's products include brake blocks and pads for heavy vehicles, trucks, and trailers applications; brake linings for light commercial vehicles; clutches; fiber based clutch facings; and industrial friction materials for various applications. It sells its products under the ERKA, Besyildiz, SAFETEX, and FiveStar brands. The company also exports its products to Algeria, Tunisia, Egypt, Iran, Iraq, Syria, Jordan, Macedonia, Kazakhstan, New Guinea, and Portugal. Balatacilar Balatacilik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1988 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

BANVT.IS.long_name: Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi
BANVT.IS.summary: Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi, a food company, provides raw chicken and turkey, sauced, ready-to-eat cooked, and delicatessen products in Turkey. It primarily engages in the business of marketing, slaughtering, production of animal feed, and breeding eggs, as well as one-day-old chicks, live turkeys and chickens, and processed turkeys and chickens. The company is also involved in the energy production activities; and provision of meat based products, such as cooked meatballs, kebabs, gyros, burgers, and coated products, as well as salami, sausages, and franks. It also exports its products to Azerbaijan, Macedonia, Kosovo, Northern Cyprus, Hong Kong, China, Georgia, Togo, Jordan, the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, and Benin. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Balikesir, Turkey. Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of TBQ Foods GmbH.

BASCM.IS.long_name: Bastas Baskent Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BASCM.IS.summary: Bastas Baskent Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells cement, clinker, aggregate, ready-mixed concrete, and lime products in Turkey. The Company was founded in 1967 and is based in Ankara, Turkey. Bastas Baskent Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Parficim S.A.

BAYRK.IS.long_name: Bayrak EBT Taban Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
BAYRK.IS.summary: Bayrak Ebt Taban Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in manufacturing PVC and thermo shoe soles for various brands. The company is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BERA.IS.summary: Bera Holding A.S. operates in the paper and cardboard, machinery, oil, construction and building materials, marble, textiles, tourism, and food sectors worldwide. The company manufactures cut and roll paper, school notebooks, box files, drawing papers, office files, printed or plain computer streamline forms, bind or spiral attached notebooks with hard covers, reminder note cubes, parchment papers, packaging papers, A4/A5 blocks, and background cardboard varieties. It is also involved in the production and marketing of bearings; construction of movable and folding hydraulic cranes; provision of agricultural machines; and building of electrical and mechanical bases of construction and infrastructure. In addition, the company engages in the storage of liquid petroleum gas, as well as filling and distribution as bottled gas, flow gas, and car gas; and operation of gas stations and resting facilities. Further, it provides flour, tapioca, dry foods, pasta, biscuits, marshmallows, and wafers under the Golda and Melda brands, as well as bottled spring water; sells and distributes food, hygiene products, and other consumer goods to retailers, wholesalers, hotels, motels, and resorts; and operates hotels. Additionally, the company produces PVC doors and windows, cast concrete, marble, limestone, timber goods, glass panes, and MDF and MDF lamels; polar, velsoft, corduroy, velvet, viscose, and various cotton fabrics; marbles and minerals; and micronized calcide that is used in the production of paper, paint, plastic, glue, ceramic, carpet base, vinyl flooring, and toothpaste products, as well as in the construction, food, and pharmaceutical industries. The company was formerly known as Kombassan Holding A.S. and changed its name to Bera Holding A.S. in July 2017. Bera Holding A.S. was founded in 1988 and is based in Konya, Turkey.

BEYAZ.IS.summary: Beyaz Filo Oto Kiralama A.S. provides fleet renting services in Turkey. It also engages in the automobile auction and retailing businesses; and maintaining the authorized dealership of Opel and Peugeot brands. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

BFREN.IS.long_name: Bosch Fren Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BFREN.IS.summary: Bosch Fren Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells hydraulic brake systems for automotive and light commercial vehicles in Turkey and internationally. It offers servo brakes, and brake master cylinders and support systems. The company was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey. Bosch Fren Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH.

BIMAS.IS.summary: BIM Birlesik Magazalar A.S., together with its subsidiaries, operates retail stores in Turkey, Morocco, and Egypt. Its stores sell approximately 750 items, including meat, breakfast and dairy, legumes and bakery, and personal care products, as well as beverages, snacks and sweets, fruits and vegetables, frozen foods, and cleaning supplies. As of March 05, 2020, the company operated 8,348 stores. BIM Birlesik Magazalar A.S. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

BIOEN.IS.long_name: Biotrend Cevre ve Enerji Yatirimlari Anonim Sirketi
BIOEN.IS.summary: Biotrend Cevre Ve Enerji Yatirimlari Anonim Sirketi engages in the solid waste management and energy production activities in Turkey. It operates biogas and biomass facilities with an installed power capacity of 55,781 MWe. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BIZIM.IS.summary: Bizim Toptan Satis Magazalari A.S. wholesales and retails of fast moving consumer goods in Turkey. The company offers dry food, delicatessen and breakfast products; paper products; home supplies and care products, hand tools, communication, meat and meat products, milk and dairy products, fruits and vegetables, beverages, cosmetics and personal care products, cleaning products, electronic and electrical appliances, energy and lighting, office and stationery, and snacks and bakery products to wholesalers, merchants, grocers, markets, supermarkets, specialized retailers, hotels, restaurants, and cafes, as well as to tax payers and legal entities, such as small dealers, small markets, canteens, catering companies, corporate customers, and industrial and public organizations. It wholesales approximately 7000 product types consisting of branded and private label products. The company sells its product through Bizimtoptan.com.tr, a digital sales platform. As of March 31, 2019, it had 175 stores in 69 cities; and 801 franchise shops. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Bizim Toptan Satis Magazalari A.S. is a subsidiary of Yildiz Holding A.S.

BJKAS.IS.long_name: Besiktas Futbol Yatirimlari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BJKAS.IS.summary: Besiktas Futbol Yatirimlari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in professional football activities in Turkey. It also invests in professional football teams; and establishes and operates football facilities. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BLCYT.IS.long_name: Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BLCYT.IS.summary: Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the textile, agriculture, and tourism businesses in Turkey. The company offers cotton, polyester-viscose, and elastane yarns. It is also involved in the cotton unseed trading; and cotton and corn farming activities; and growing citrus and olive trees. Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1950 and is based in Adana, Turkey.

BNTAS.IS.long_name: Bantas Bandirma Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BNTAS.IS.summary: Bantas Bandirma Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in tin packaging production activities. The company offers tin cans for olives, cheese, pickles, and olive and vegetable oils. It also serves the mineral oil, and paint industries. In addition, the company exports its products worldwide. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Balikesir, Turkey.

BOSSA.IS.long_name: Bossa Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmeleri T.A.S.
BOSSA.IS.summary: Bossa Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmeleri T.A.S. manufactures, markets, and sells textile products in Turkey and internationally. It offers various denim fabrics. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Adana, Turkey.

BRISA.IS.long_name: Brisa Bridgestone Sabanci Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BRISA.IS.summary: Brisa Bridgestone Sabanci Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells tires in Turkey. It offers tires for passenger cars, light commercial vehicles, buses, trucks, tractors, and construction equipment under the Bridgestone, Lassa, Firestone, Dayton, and Kinesis brands; retreading tires under the Bandag brand name; and batteries under the Energizer brand. The company also provides road help services under the Bridgestone Road Friend Hot Line, Lassa Road Help, and Filofix brand names; and tire storage services under the Profleet, Mobilfix, and Tyre Hotel brands, as well as operates the Brisa Academy training channel. It offers its products and services through approximately 1200 signboarded sales and service points under the Otopratik, Propratik, Lastigim, Lastik Vs., and Speedy brands; and alternative sales channels, such as Bridgestone Box and lastik.com.tr name. The company was formerly known as Lassa Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Brisa Bridgestone Sabanci Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in 1988. Brisa Bridgestone Sabanci Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1974 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BRKO.IS.long_name: Birko Birlesik Koyunlulular Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S.
BRKO.IS.summary: Birko Birlesik Koyunlulular Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. produces and sells machinery carpets in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Nigde, Turkey.

BRKSN.IS.long_name: Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Üretim Ve Ticaret A.S.
BRKSN.IS.summary: Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Ãretim Ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells heat and sound insulation and industrial packaging materials in Turkey and internationally. It offers polyethylene, polypropylene, and cross-linked foams. The company also provides a range of services, such as interstory screed application, wall and roof insulation, soundproofing and thermal insulation, refrigerated cooler vehicle insulation, air conditioning inside and outside tools, sound and vibration isolation, and heat and noise prevention in mechanical installations. It sells its products under the Foamex, Polyberk, Proberk, Reflekt, Airpack, and Airfoam brand names. The company provides its services to the companies in the construction/industrial, packaging, fittings, automotive, footwear/bags, sea products, children playgroup, and sports/entertainment sectors. Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Ãretim Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1993 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BRMEN.IS.long_name: Birlik Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmesi A.S.
BRMEN.IS.summary: Birlik Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmesi A.S. manufactures and sells cotton yarns in Turkey and internationally. The company offers cotton terry towels, bathrobes, home textile products, curtains, mattresses, and bed bases under the SOLEY brand. It also provides gabardine and poplin fabrics. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.

BRSAN.IS.long_name: Borusan Mannesmann Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BRSAN.IS.summary: Borusan Mannesmann Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells steel pipes in Turkey. The company offers ERW line pipes, spirally welded line pipes, boiler tubes, pressure purpose tubes, casing and tubing products, and natural gas pipes for the energy market. It also provides water pipes, sprinkle pipes, SRM pipes, spirally welded water line pipes, and water well casing pipes; and circular hollow section and self-anchor pipes, and foundation/piling tubes for use in construction. In addition, the company offers automotive tubes; hydraulic cylinder tubes; welded cold and drawn tubes; and steel profiles for the use in various sectors, such as automotive, construction, agricultural machinery, towel rails, furniture, etc. It also exports its products to various countries in the United States, Europe, Africa, and Asia. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Borusan Mannesmann Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Borusan Mannesmann Boru Yatirim Holding A.S.

BRYAT.IS.summary: Borusan Yatirim ve Pazarlama A.S. invests in companies operating in steel, distributorship, logistics, and technology sectors. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BSOKE.IS.summary: BatisÃ¶ke SÃ¶ke Ãimento Sanayii T.A.S. produces and sells cement and clinker products in Turkey. Its products include Portland cement clinker and Portland cement, as well as aggregates. BATISÃKE SÃ¶ke Ãimento Sanayii T.A.S. was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

BTCIM.IS.long_name: Batiçim Bati Anadolu Çimento Sanayii Anonim Sirketi
BTCIM.IS.summary: BatiÃ§im Bati Anadolu Ãimento Sanayii Anonim Sirketi operates in the cement industry in Turkey. It offers Portland cement clinkers and potassium silicate cements; Portland, sulphate resistant Portland, Portland compound, and pozzolanic cements; and aggregate and cement bypass dust products. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

BUCIM.IS.summary: Bursa Cimento Fabrikasi A.S. produces and sells cement and clinker products in Turkey. The company offers Portland, Portland composite, and pozzolanic cement. It also exports its products to Russia, Azerbaijan, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Albania, Portugal, Romania, Greece, Libia, Egypt, Algeria, Sudan, Nigeria, Gambia, Cape Verde, Ghana, and Cyprus. The company was incorporated in 1966 and is based in Bursa, Turkey.

BURCE.IS.long_name: Burçelik Bursa Çelik Döküm Sanayii A.S.
BURCE.IS.summary: BurÃ§elik Bursa Ãelik DÃ¶kÃ¼m Sanayii A.S. manufactures and sells heavy machinery, steel castings, and industrial valves in Turkey. It offers machinery factory products, including track-mounted mobile crushers, impact and cone crushers, stationary and semi-mobile stone crushing machineries, jaw crushers, hammer crushers, sand machines, vertical shaft impactors, feeders, and vibrating screens for crushing-screening-washing plants in the aggregate and mining sectors. The company also provides diversified products, such as ship loading systems for ports, extrusion presses for Al and Cu base alloys, ball mills, and material handling systems; and factory products, such as butterfly and ball valves for pneumatic, electrical actuators, and automation applications. In addition, it offers foundry products comprising kiln rolls and rings, mill trunnions, liners, kiln and mill split gears, pinions, and other wear parts for cement industry; slag pots, blast furnace bells and rings, coiler drums, and chock blocks for iron and steel industry; marine engine parts and stern tube bosses for shipyards; and die holders for automotive industry. Further, the company manufactures ship decks, crane jibs, and adapters; finished crawling crusher units; fine/rough machined components and assemblies for cone, impact, and jaw crushers; jaw stocks, and jaw and cone crusher bodies; and hydro-mechanical parts. It also exports its products to West Europe, Balkan countries, North Africa, the Middle East, and internationally. It products are used in valve, maritime, energy, cement, iron and steel, mineral and crushers, automotive, and general machinery industries. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Bursa, Turkey. BurÃ§elik Bursa Ãelik DÃ¶kÃ¼m Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of Komurcuoglu Insaat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

BURVA.IS.long_name: Burçelik Vana Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BURVA.IS.summary: BurÃ§elik Vana Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. engages in steel casting, and machinery and valve manufacturing businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. Ege EndÃ¼stri ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Bayraktar Holding A.S.

EGGUB.IS.summary: Ege GÃ¼bre Sanayii A.S. produces and sells fertilizers in Turkey. The company offers compound fertilizers and organic solvents. It also provides various port services, including pier loading, unloading, and storage services, as well as operates tank farm facilities that provide petroleum products storage services. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

EGPRO.IS.long_name: Ege Profil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
EGPRO.IS.summary: Ege Profil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells plastic pipes, spare parts, and various profiles and plastic goods in Turkey. The company provides PVC windows, doors, and shutter systems under the Winsa brand; PVC window and door profiles under the Egepen Deceuninck brand; PVC pipes under the Pimas brand; and glass balcony systems under the Camoda brand. It also offers uPVC profile systems under the Inoutic brand; and various PVC products under the Maestro brand name. In addition, the company provides products under the IQ AlÃ¼minyum brand. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Asia, Africa, and Australia. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Ege Profil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Deceuninck NV.

EGSER.IS.long_name: Ege Seramik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
EGSER.IS.summary: Ege Seramik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells floor and wall ceramic tiles in Turkey and internationally. The company also provides glazed porcelain. It offers its products in various materials, such as wood, marble and stone, concrete, textile, brick, vintage, mosaics, mini tiles, and decorative products for used in bathroom, kitchen, corridor, garden, commercial, and industrial areas. The company was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Kemalpasa, Turkey. Ege Seramik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Ibrahim Polat Holding A.S.

EKGYO.IS.long_name: Emlak Konut Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S.
EKGYO.IS.summary: In 1953, a mentality that would lead the urbanization efforts of a country and improve the people's life quality was born. In that year, Emlak Konut, the deep-rooted brand of the construction industry, started its journey of success. The corporate vision was decided to build environmentally conscious modern cities that add comfort to human life. With this purpose, Emlak Konut became the architect of many innovative practices in the industry. Emlak Konut delivered many projects leaving a good example and traces for planned urbanization in our country. It built the most innovative neighborhoods of its era with projects so large that even their surroundings were named after them. This stable growth brought up a significant milestone as well. In 2002, Emlak Konut turned into a real estate investment company. This transformation was the herald for the giant projects, barnburners and becoming an even bigger company. After the establishment of the real estate investment company, Emlak Konut initiated 139 new projects that would have a broad effect on the world, embody environmentally conscious technologies and add value to cities. The number of units built and tendered since 2003 has reached 129.000 Emlak Konut went public twice, crowning its fast growth and taking its targets to wider horizons. The initial public offering which took place in 2010, ranked among the top 5 public offerings in the Republic's history. The second one, in 2013, became the greatest real estate public offering in the last 5 years in Europe. Growing with public offerings, Emlak Konut strengthens its place among the largest companies in Turkey with its paid-in capital of TRY 3,8 billion and its total value of assets of TRY 24,8 billion. Since its foundation, Emlak Konut has been taking firm steps towards the future with its increasing momentum, human-oriented corporate culture and its latest state. It is getting closer and closer to its goal of becoming Turkey's pride as a global player in the world.

EKIZ.IS.long_name: Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
EKIZ.IS.summary: Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the production and sale of olive oil products in Egypt. The company provides natural extra virgin, natural first, organic extra virgin, and refined olive oil, as well as Riviera olive oil. It offers its products under the Belluti, Dona Elena, Healthy You, and Kantarli brand names. The company was formerly known as Ekiz Yag ve Sabun Sanayii A.S. and changed its name to Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in September 2014. Ekiz Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1946 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

EMKEL.IS.summary: Emek Elektrik Endustrisi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells transformers, disconnectors, epoxy resin, and silicone composite products in Turkey. It offers oil immersed and epoxy resin current and voltage transformers, disconnectors with and without earthing switches, insulators, components, grading and coupling capacitors, and phase earthing switches. The company also exports its products to 118 countries. Emek Elektrik Endustrisi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

EMNIS.IS.long_name: Eminis Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
EMNIS.IS.summary: Eminis Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells plastic and metal packaging solutions in Turkey and internationally. Its products are used for paints, glues, lube oils, chemicals, ice creams, yoghurts, cheese, frozen foods, honey, jams, olives, hazelnut cocoa-butter, candies, spices/powder, drinks, hair gel, and cosmetic products. The company serves for paint, chemicals, and food sectors. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Dilovasi, Turkey.

ENJSA.IS.summary: Enerjisa Enerji A.S. operates as an electricity distribution and retail company in Turkey. The company operates through two segments, Electricity Distribution and Retail. It engages in the transmission of electricity over lines to the end users through distribution networks, as well as retail sale of electricity. As of December 31, 2020, the company had 11.4 million distribution network connections and 10.1 million customers of retail electricity market. It also provides marketing, energy management, and energy consultancy services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ENKAI.IS.summary: Enka Insaat ve Sanayi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a construction company in Turkey, Russia, Kazakhstan, Georgia, Iraq, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Construction, Rental, Energy, and Trading and Manufacturing. The company engages in the construction of industrial and social buildings, and motorways; construction and operation of natural gas fired electrical energy generation facilities; and investment in and development of real estate properties and shopping malls. It is also involved in the marketing and after-sale service of construction machineries, trucks, industrial products, and spare parts; manufacturing of structural steel works; installation and establishment of the technical equipment; and excavation backfilling works and quarrying crushing operation of highway projects. In addition, the company engages in the pile dwelling work; base and superstructure construction; slip form and construction of drilling and ground surveys; organization of conventions and seminars; tour reservations and tickets sales; production of ready-mixed concrete; production and sale of electricity; repair and maintenance of power plants; and provision of architectural design and air transportation services, as well as trading activities. Further, it is involved in various activities, such as material handling and storage systems, auxiliary facilities, water treatment and environmental engineering, infrastructure and construction, control systems, and instrumentation engineering activities. Enka Insaat ve Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

EPLAS.IS.long_name: Egeplast Ege Plastik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
EPLAS.IS.summary: Egeplast Ege Plastik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells plastic pipes, fittings, and spare parts in Turkey and internationally. It offers building group systems, which include waste water pipes and fittings, PPRC sanitary pipes and fittings, PVC rain gutters and down pipes, and heating system pipes and fittings; and infrastructure group systems, such as PVC-U pressure pipe systems, PVC-U sewer pipes and fittings, EGE corrugated pipes, polyethylene (PE) pipes and fittings, natural gas pipes and fittings, drainage pipes and fittings, and HDPE corrugated and PE telecommunication systems. The company also provides agricultural group systems that consists of polyethylene pipe irrigation systems and drip irrigation systems. Egeplast Ege Plastik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

ERBOS.IS.long_name: Erbosan Erciyas Boru Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S.
ERBOS.IS.summary: Erbosan Erciyas Boru Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. produces and trades in carbon steel tubes and pipes in Turkey. It offers welded steel black pipes and galvanized pipes used in building heating, mechanical installations, and plumbing and ventilation systems; gas and line pipes used in LPG installation, boiler tubes for drilling lines, as well as natural gas, petroleum and gas line projects; sprinkler pipes used for sprinkler systems and fire protection. The company also provides industrial tubes and hollow sections for use in automotive, home appliances, furniture, greenhouse, construction, and transportation industries, as well as fence, industry and building, and solar energy systems. Erbosan Erciyas Boru Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Kayseri, Turkey.

EREGL.IS.long_name: Eregli Demir ve Çelik Fabrikalari T.A.S.
EREGL.IS.summary: Eregli Demir ve Ãelik Fabrikalari T.A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells iron and steel rolled products, alloyed and non-alloyed iron, steel and pig iron castings, cast and pressed products, coke, and by-products in Turkey and internationally. The company's flat products include hot rolled flat steel products, cold-rolled flat steel products, and galvanized/galvanealed flat steel products; and tin/chrome coated flat steel products used in metal packaging industry. It also provides various byproducts, including motor benzole, pure benzole, toluol, xylol, crude tar, ammonium sulphate, iron sulphate, and granulated high furnace slag. In addition, the company offers port services, such as loading and unloading, maritime, third party, warehouse, liquid and solid waste collection, maritime police, and customs and customs enforcement services. It primarily serves automotive, white goods, construction, pipes and tubes, rolling, general machinery and manufacturing, household appliance, heat and pressure vessel equipment, electrics-electronics, mechanical engineering, energy, shipbuilding, defense, and packaging industries. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ERELY.long_name: Eregli Demir ve Çelik Fabrikalari T.A.S.
ERELY.summary: Eregli Demir ve Ãelik Fabrikalari T.A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells iron and steel rolled products, alloyed and non-alloyed iron, steel and pig iron castings, cast and pressed products, coke, and by-products in Turkey and internationally. The company's flat products include hot rolled flat steel products, cold-rolled flat steel products, and galvanized/galvanealed flat steel products; and tin/chrome coated flat steel products used in metal packaging industry. It also provides various byproducts, including motor benzole, pure benzole, toluol, xylol, crude tar, ammonium sulphate, iron sulphate, and granulated high furnace slag. It primarily serves automotive, white goods, construction, pipes and tubes, rolling, general machinery and manufacturing, household appliance, heat and pressure vessel equipment, electrics-electronics, mechanical engineering, energy, shipbuilding, defense, and packaging industries. ERSU.IS.long_name: Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S.
ERSU.IS.summary: Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S. manufactures and sells fruit concentrates and pulp juices in Turkey and internationally. The company offers clear products, including pear, quince, blackberry, apple, raspberry, sourcherry, pomegranate, black carrot, grape, carrot, and Ã§ilek juice concentrates; cloudy products, such as peach, apricot, and plum juice concentrates; and citrus fruit products consisting of orange, grapefruit, and lemon juice concentrates. It also provides puree products comprising pear, strawberry, apple, plum, fig, apricot, and peach puree; and tomato paste. In addition, the company offers pomegranate, apple, orange, black carrot, and grape juices; and fruit nectars, such as freemix, mixed fruit, apricot, orange, peach, and sour cherry nectars, as well as lemonade. The company distributes its products through a network of 9 regional directorates, as well as approximately 100 distributors. It serves retail sales points, as well as military facilities, hospital cafes, schools and sport complexes, catering, etc. Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1969 and is based in Konya, Turkey.

ESCOM.IS.summary: Escort Teknoloji Yatirim A.S. provides technology-based products, solutions, and services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers consumer electronic products, such as DSLR and compact cameras, lenses, mobile and tripod models, and carrying bags; and data and power communication infrastructure solutions comprising structured cabling products that can be used in various types of applications, including data centers, rack cabinets, cable ducts, office sockets, and power distribution units. It also engages in the purchase, assembly, sale, export, and import of computer programs, computer printers, and various electronic and electrical equipment, as well as machinery and devices and their spare parts. In addition, the company generates solar based renewable energy. It provides products and solutions in the field of information and energy infrastructure, banking, military, and industrial electronics. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ESEN.IS.summary: Esenboga Elektrik Ãretim A.S. invests in solar energy sector in Turkey. The company owns 30 solar power plants with a capacity of 33.79 MWp. It also provides EPC services for solar power plants. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey. Esenboga Elektrik Ãretim A.S. is a subsidiary of Naturel Yenilenebilir Enerji Ticaret A.S.

ETILR.IS.long_name: Etiler Gida Ve Ticari Yatirimlar Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi

The company offers various financial services, such as trading of derivatives, stocks, and bond-bills; repo and reverse repo transactions; credit securities trading services; public offering; and investment consultancy. It also provides portfolio management services to individuals and corporates. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

EUKYO.IS.long_name: Euro Kapital Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi

EUYO.IS.long_name: Euro Menkul Kiymet Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi

FADE.IS.long_name: Fade Gida Yatirim Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi

FENER.IS.summary: FenerbahÃ§e Futbol A.S. provides commercial and related services for football club. It also distributes, markets, and sells Fenerbahce licensed products through 76 stores, as well as corners and website. The company was founded in 1907 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. FenerbahÃ§e Futbol A.S. is a subsidiary of FenerbahÃ§e S.K.

FLAP.IS.long_name: Flap Kongre Toplanti Hizmetleri Otomotiv ve Turizm A.S.
FLAP.IS.summary: Flap Kongre Toplanti Hizmetleri Otomotiv ve Turizm A.S. plans and organizes events and meetings under Flap Tour brand name for the tourism industry. The company organizes product launch meetings, education meetings, dealers meetings, and corporate opening organizations. It is also involved in organizing press meetings and bulletins; and the preparation of the printed materials for presentations. In addition, the company offers association management services, such as general management and secretariat, membership succeeding, course and seminar organizations, finance and budget management, and Web services; and IT and graphic design services, including logo and visual projects for congress and meetings, design and printing of printed materials, online abstract module software, electronic poster module software, congress registration and accommodation module software, and internal use web server and customizable software options. Further, it provides ticketing services; and tracks payments and contracts of the hotel projects. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

FMIZP.IS.long_name: Federal-Mogul Izmit Piston Ve Pim Üretim Tesisleri A.S.
FMIZP.IS.summary: Federal-Mogul Izmit Piston Ve Pim Ãretim Tesisleri A.S. provides pistons and pins in Turkey. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Kocaeli, Turkey. Federal-Mogul Izmit Piston Ve Pim Ãretim Tesisleri A.S. is a subsidiary of Federal Mogul Powertrain Otomotiv A.S.

FO9A.SG.summary: Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. manufactures, assembles, imports, exports, and sells motor vehicles and spare parts in Turkey. It offers commercial, transit and transit custom, and transit courier vehicles; and cargo trucks, as well as engines and powertrain products for trucks and transit vehicles. The company also imports and sells passenger cars. Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. has a collaboration with Velodyne Lidar, Inc. for the product development and testing of autonomous heavy commercial trucks. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

FONET.IS.summary: Fonet Bilgi Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi provides computer software and technical support services for public and private institutions in Turkey. The company offers consulting services in the information technology sector; software development and technical support services; system integration and turnkey project services; and training services. It also provides software management software, which includes Hospital Information Management Systems; Laboratory Information Systems; Hospital To Hospital; and Operational Business Intelligence. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

FORMT.IS.long_name: Formet Celik Kapi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
FORMT.IS.summary: Formet Celik Kapi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the manufacture and sale of steel doors primarily in Turkey. It also provides cookers and heaters, including built in ovens and cookers, chimney hoods, free standing ovens, table top cookers, midi ovens, gas heaters, electric heaters, infrared gas heaters, and air curtains; and metal products, as well as accessories. In addition, the company exports its products to approximately 40 countries in Europe, Asia, the United States, Africa, and the Middle East. Formet Celik Kapi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is based in Kayseri, Turkey.

FOVSY.summary: Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. manufactures, assembles, imports, exports, and sells motor vehicles and spare parts in Turkey. The company also imports and sells passenger cars. Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. has a collaboration with Velodyne Lidar, Inc. for the product development and testing of autonomous heavy commercial trucks. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

FRIGO.IS.long_name: Frigo-Pak Gida Maddeleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
FRIGO.IS.summary: Frigo-Pak Gida Maddeleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells carbonated and still drinks, fruit juices, and canned and frozen foods in Turkey. It offers apple, orange, peach, mango, apricot, pineapple, and lemon juices. The company also provides frozen fruits and vegetables; canned foods, such as citrus, plums, red kidney beans, sour and sweet cherries, and strawberries, as well as pepper products; and fruit and vegetable purees, including pastes and sauces. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

FROTO.IS.summary: Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. manufactures, assembles, imports, exports, and sells motor vehicles and spare parts in Turkey. The company also imports and sells passenger cars. Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. has a collaboration with Velodyne Lidar, Inc. for the product development and testing of autonomous heavy commercial trucks. The company also provides various cards; and auto, liability, health, unemployment, life, house, individual accident, automobile, business premises, fire, freight, engineering, loan, and agriculture insurance products, as well as pension products. In addition, it offers mutual funds, T-bills/government bonds, Eurobonds, repos, equities, dual currency deposit transactions, Turkish derivatives exchange, e-trader, forward transactions, and taxation services; cash management services; and SME specific products, such as support packages, foreign trade financing and legislation, and related services. Further, the company provides leasing, fleet management, factoring, investment and private banking, payment, safety box, and Internet and mobile/SMS banking services. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 904 branches in Turkey, as well as 7 branches and 2 representative offices internationally. The company was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

GARFA.IS.summary: Garanti Faktoring A.S. provides factoring services to industrial and commercial firms. The company provides financing, guarantee, and commercial collection management services in selling goods/services; and supplier financing services in buying goods/services. It serves SMEs, import and export companies, and other corporations through a network of 11 branches in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Garanti Faktoring Hizmetleri A.S and changed its name to Garanti Faktoring A.S. in April 2014. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Garanti Faktoring A.S. is a subsidiary of TÃ¼rkiye Garanti Bankasi A.S.

GEDIK.IS.summary: Gedik Yatirim Menkul Degerler A.S. provides investment banking advisory and brokerage services to individual and institutional investors in Turkey and internationally. It provides services in private placements, initial and secondary public offerings, private-sector bond issues, and bill issuances, as well as various borrowing instruments. The company also offers brokerage services to investors in the equity market, bonds and bills market, repo/reverse repo market, derivatives market, international bonds and bills market, international depository receipt market, and leveraged purchases and sales transactions. In addition, it provides investment research and advisory, discretionary portfolio management, asset management, and derivatives market services. The company's investment and trading platforms include Gedik Online Stock Exchange, Gedik Mobile, Investment Center, Gedik private, Gedik trader, and Gedik universal. Gedik Yatirim Menkul Degerler A.S. was founded in 1991 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Gedik Yatirim Menkul Degerler A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Inveo Yatirim Holding A.S.

GEDZA.IS.long_name: Gediz Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
GEDZA.IS.summary: Gediz Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells corrugated polypropylene (PP) sheets in Europe. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Gediz, Turkey.

GENTS.IS.long_name: Gentas Dekoratif Yuzeyler Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
GENTS.IS.summary: Gentas Dekoratif Yuzeyler Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells tabletops, school tables, building profiles, and chairs in Turkey and internationally. The company was formerly known as Gentas Genel Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Gentas Dekoratif Yuzeyler Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in April 2020. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

GEREL.IS.long_name: Gersan Elektrik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi

It also produces various conductors and connection parts for earthing systems; feeder pillar and distribution panel systems; G-bus automation systems; Led-bus systems; car charging systems; and underfloor trunkings. In addition, the company provides grounding and lightning prevention systems, spark gap arresters, main and intermediate distribution plates, elevated type cable supports and bauds, ventilation systems, support elements, cable combinations, cable and pipe tagging systems, and special conveyors, as well as disconnect, connect, and support elements. Its products are used in steel construction combination and fixation systems for power transmission lines, mechanical conveyor systems, buildings, industrial plants, car factories, airports, oil-gas refineries, malls, platform grills, and fixation and concrete systems. The company was formerly known as Gersan Ticaret. Gersan Elektrik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

GLBMD.IS.summary: Global Menkul Degerler Anonim Sirketi provides capital market brokerage services to individuals, financial institutions, and local and international investors. It operates through a network of three branches. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Global Menkul Degerler Anonim Sirketi operates as a subsidiary of Global Yatirim Holding A.S.

GLRYH.IS.summary: GÃ¼ler Yatirim Holding A.S. engages in the investment activities in Turkey and internationally. The company was formerly known as Baskent Menkul Kiymetler Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. and changed its name to GÃ¼ler Yatirim Holding Anonim Sirketi in August 2011. GÃ¼ler Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

GLYHO.IS.summary: Global Yatirim Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the port operations, energy generation, natural gas, mining, brokerage and asset management, real estate, and other businesses in Turkey. The company operates cruise and commercial port facilities; biomass power plants with an installed capacity of 29.2 MW; and power plants with 16.8 MWp installed capacity, as well as co/tri-generation with 54.1 MW of installed capacity. It is also involved in the compressed natural gas sales and distribution activities with 10 bulk CNG plants, 3 auto-CNG stations, 296 CNG road tankers, and 47 industrial-scale compressors; and feldspar mining and production business. In addition, the company develops and operates shopping centers, offices, residences, hospitals, schools, hotels, and industrial lands. Further, it offers asset management services; and securities and derivatives trading and portfolio management services to international and Turkish corporate investors. Additionally, it engages in the insurance agency, publishing, storage, food management, ship management, and marine vehicle trade businesses; and construction, maritime, tourism, and real estate investment businesses. The company was formerly known as Global Menkul Degerler A.S. and changed its name to Global Yatirim Holding Anonim Sirketi in October 2004. Global Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

GOLTS.IS.long_name: Göltas Göller Bölgesi Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
GOLTS.IS.summary: GÃ¶ltas GÃ¶ller BÃ¶lgesi Ãimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and markets clinker, cement, and plant mixed concrete in Turkey. The company offers Portland cement, Portland composite cement, Pozzolanic cement, and sulfate resistant cement. It also provides raw materials and semi-finished products, including gypsum, trass, limestone, marn, iron ore, and bauxite; and Portland cement clinker, as well as SR 5 clinker products. The company offers its rubber tire products for light trucks, truckers, and motorcycles; earthmoving, mining, and industrial equipment; and racing, aviation, and various other applications. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Goodyear Lastikleri T.A.S. is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

GOZDE.IS.long_name: Gozde Girisim Sermayesi Yatirim Ortakligi A.S.
GOZDE.IS.summary: Gozde Girisim Sermayesi Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in investments in early venture, mid venture, late venture, pre-IPO opportunities and in equity private placements, consolidations and buildups, and growth capital financings. The firm targets to invest in non-food companies having financial and operational restructuring needs. It focuses its investment in finance, information and communication technology, retail, renewable energy, real estate, logistics, and agriculture. The firm typically holds controlling or significant minority interests in companies in Turkey. It seeks to act as lead equity investor in strategic minority equity investments. The firm seeks to hold its investment for five to seven years. Gozde Girisim Sermayesi Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. was founded in January 2010 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey with an additional office in Istanbul, Turkey.

GPH.L.short_name: GLOBAL PORTS HOLDING PLC ORD GB

It operates cruise ports for serving cruise liners, ferries, yachts, and mega-yachts, as well as individual passengers. The company also engages in the commercial port operations that specialize in container, bulk, and general cargo handling activities; and storage, logistics, and marine vehicle trade businesses. It operates a network of 21 ports. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Global Ports Holding Plc is a subsidiary of Global Ports Holding B.V.

GRNYO.IS.summary: Garanti Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a publicly owned investment manager. It provides its services to employees, stakeholders, public welfare, corporate governance compliances. The firm invests in the public equity across the globe. The firm focuses on operating gold and other precious metals portfolio traded in the domestic and international stock markets. The company was founded in July 9, 1996 and is based in Sariyer, Turkey.

GSDDE.IS.long_name: GSD Denizcilik Gayrimenkul Insaat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. GSD Denizcilik Gayrimenkul Insaat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a subsidiary of GSD Holding A.S.

GSDHO.IS.summary: GSD Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, provides banking and factoring products and services. The company shipping, energy, and education businesses. GSRAY.IS.long_name: Galatasaray Sportif Sinai ve Ticari Yatirimlar A.S.

HALKB.IS.summary: TÃ¼rkiye Halk Bankasi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services. IDGYO.IS.summary: Idealist Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a real estate investment trust. Idealist Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ISGYO.IS.summary: Is Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. (Is REIC) is a real estate investment trust company (REIC) whose solid portfolio and sound financial structure make it one of the leading firms in the real estate sector. Is REIC is focused on assuring the optimum risk versus return balance for its investors on the back of a diversified and well-balance portfolio. Is REIC is a portfolio management company which invests in real estate properties and real estate projects and whose activities are carried out in compliance with the requirements of Turkish Capital Markets Board (CMB) laws and regulations. Is REIC was originally founded on 6 August 1999 as a result of the merger of two real companies: Isbank-owned Is Gayrimenkul Yatirim ve Proje Degerlendirme A.S. and Merkez Gayrimenkul Yatirim ve Proje Degerlendirme A.S. Adhering to a policy of pursuing only healthy, sustainable growth since the day it was founded, Is REIC reinforces the deep-rooted corporate principles and financial strength of the Isbank Group of which it is a member with a strong sectoral vision and distinguished projects of its own. With steady rental income generated by its high-quality portfolio, its own deep equity resources, and convenient access to external funding, Is REIC is able to finance an uninterrupted series of new investments that further accelerate its growth and advance its position in the sector.
