PAGYO.IS.summary: Panora Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a real estate investment trust. It invests in the real estate markets of Turkey. Panora Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is based in Turkey.

PAMEL.IS.summary: Pamukova Yenilenebilir Elektrik Uretim A.S. engages in the construction and operation of power plants in Turkey. It operates a 6,744 MW hydroelectric power plant. The company was formerly known as Bomonti Elektrik Muhendislik Musavirlik Insaat Turizm Ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Pamukova Yenilenebilir Elektrik Uretim A.S. in December 2020. Pamukova Yenilenebilir Elektrik Uretim A.S. was founded in 2007 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

PARSN.IS.summary: Parsan Makina ParÃ§alari Sanayii A.S. produces and sells forging parts and components for light, medium, and heavy vehicle manufacturers in Turkey. The company offers body parts, including rear axle shafts, front axle beams, and front axle assemblies; and engine parts, such as crankshafts, camshafts, forged pistons, steering knuckles, rods, pinion forgings, various gear forgings, spider gears, slip shafts, and other products and assemblies. It serves automotive, agricultural and construction equipment, aerospace, railway, and other industries. The company also exports its products to Germany, Belgium, Italy, France, Spain, the United Kingdom, Hungary, Czech Republic, Austria, Netherlands, Egypt, and South Africa. Parsan Makina ParÃ§alari Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1968 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

PEGYO.IS.summary: PERA Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS is a publicly owned real estate investment trust. It invests in the real estate markets of Turkey. PERA Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

PEKGY.IS.long_name: Peker Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi
PEKGY.IS.summary: Peker Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi engages in the real estate business in Turkey. It develops, holds, trades, rents, and sells real estate projects; and trades in securities. The company also involved in the fixture of vehicles and facilities. Further, it engages in the media business, as well as provides site management services. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

PENGD.IS.summary: Penguen Gida Sanayi A.S. produces and sells fruit and vegetable products in Turkey. The company's products include jam, preserved vegetables, ready meals, preserved boiled legumes, tomato and pepper pastes, pickles, delicatessen, sauces and spreads, preserves, and frozen food products. It offers its products to national and local market chains, and middle-sized retailers, as well as mass consumption channels, such as hotels, restaurants, and cafeterias. The company exports its products to 35 countries, including Germany, the United States, France, the Netherlands, Switzerland, Russia, and Sweden. Penguen Gida Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1988 and is based in Bursa, Turkey.

PENTA.IS.long_name: Penta Teknoloji Urunleri Dagitim Ticaret A.S.
PENTA.IS.summary: Penta Teknoloji Urunleri Dagitim Ticaret A.S. engages in the distribution of technology products in Turkey. It offers personal computers, PC components, peripherals and accessories, software, server-storage and networking products, and documentation solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

PETKM.IS.summary: Petkim Petrokimya Holding Anonim Sirketi produces and sells petrochemical products in Turkey and internationally. The company offers thermoplastics, such as low density polyethylene, high density polyethylene, polypropylene, and polyvinyl chloride; fiber raw materials, including acrylonitrile, mono-ethylene glycol, and pure terephthalic acid; aromatics, such as benzene, paraxylene, orthoxylene, and toluene; olefins comprising polymer and chemical grade propylene, and ethylene; and other products, such as crude C4, C5 mixture, aromatic oil, pyrolysis gasoline, diethyleneglycol, sodiumhydroxide, and phthalic anhydride. Its products are used in the plastics, chemicals, packaging, piping, paint, construction, agriculture, automotive, electricity, electronics, and textiles, as well as pharmaceuticals, detergents, and cosmetics sectors. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Petkim Petrokimya Holding A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Socar Turkey Petrokimya AS.

PETUN.IS.long_name: Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S.
PETUN.IS.summary: Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S. produces and sells meat and by-products of cattle, sheep, poultry, and fish under the Pinar brand in Turkey. It offers delicatessen products, including soudjouks, salamis, sausages, hams, smoked meats, roasted meat products, and pastramis; frozen meat products, such as burgers, meatballs, doners, and breaded meat products; and frozen dough products comprising pizzas, puff pastries, mantis, boreks, and boyoz products. The company also provides frozen seafood products consisting of shrimps, sliced squids, and breaded seafood products, as well as anchovy, sardine, and haddock products; and unprocessed meat products, such as unprocessed turkey, beef, and lamb products. It serves hotels, restaurants, catering companies, and schools. The company also exports its products. Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

PGSUS.IS.summary: Pegasus Hava Tasimaciligi Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, provides airline services. It provides high-frequency services on short- and medium-haul, point-to-point, and transit routes on its domestic and international network. The company also offers charter flight services, as well as cargo and simulated flight training services. As of December 31, 2019, it offered scheduled passenger services on 35 domestic routes in Turkey, as well as 76 international routes to European, CIS, and the Middle Eastern and African destinations; and operated a fleet of 84 aircraft. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Pegasus Hava Tasimaciligi Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Esas Holding A.S.

PINSU.IS.long_name: Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
PINSU.IS.summary: Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells bottled water, pet bottle, carbonated and noncarbonated beverage, and fruit beverage under the Pinar Yasam Pinarim brand name in Turkey. It also exports its products to United Kingdom, Germany, the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus, Iraq, Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Romania, Ireland, Libya, Singapore, Malta, Kosovo, Trinidad Tobago, Switzerland, the United States, Ukraine, and Belgium. The company was formerly known as Pinar Su Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in April 2019. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Pinar Su ve Icecek Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

PKART.IS.long_name: Plastikkart Akilli Kart Iletisim Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
PKART.IS.summary: Plastikkart Akilli Kart Iletisim Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells smart cards. The company offers contact, contactless, and dual interface banking/payment cards; loyalty and transportation cards; e-government and ID cards; payphone and metering cards; SIM cards; and security solutions, such as PKI cards, readers, and tokens. It also provides security printing; card personalization; card life cycle management and processing; server hosting; and consultancy services, including card based projects management and printing design consultancy, and card technology training services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Plastikkart Akilli Kart Iletisim Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Gemalto N.V.

PKENT.IS.summary: Petrokent Turizm A.S. manages holiday resorts in Turkey. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey.

PNSUT.IS.summary: Pinar SÃ¼t Mamulleri Sanayii A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the processing, production, and sale of milk and dairy products in Turkey. It offers milk, butter, cheese, yoghurts, kefir, ayrans, creams, fruit juices and drinks, flavors, desserts, delicatessens, convenience foods, sea foods, bottled water, out-of-home consumption products, sauces, jam and honey, pudding, and powdered products under the Pinar brand name. The company also exports its products to 27 countries, including Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Qatar, Iraq, TRNC, Azerbaijan, Russia, Brazil, the People's Republic of China, the United States, and other countries. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Pinar SÃ¼t MamÃ¼lleri Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

POLHO.IS.summary: Polisan Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells chemical materials in Turkey. The company offers formaldehyde, formaldehyde resins, construction chemicals, and AUS 32; polyethylene terephthalate granules and preforms; paints; and bulk liquid storage, general warehouse, and loading and unloading services for dry bulk and general cargo vessels. It also provides polyethylene terephthalate resin and preform products for use in beverage, water, food, drink, and food containers, as well as in synthetic fibers. In addition, the company engages in the construction of water channels, roads, bridges, dams, sewers, and infrastructure facilities; trading and manufacturing of construction and installation materials; and organizing domestic and overseas trips for tourism, occupation, and education purposes. Polisan Holding A.S. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Dilovasi, Turkey.

POLTK.IS.long_name: Politeknik Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
POLTK.IS.summary: Politeknik Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells aluminum surface treatment chemicals in Turkey. The company offers anodizing chemicals and powder coating pretreatment chemicals. It also provides engineering, design, and consultancy services for anodizing lines; and anodizing plant accessories, including jig holders, jigs, plastic clamps, plastic pliers, and sealing balls, as well as undertakes turn-key anodizing projects. In addition, the company offers anodizing plant equipment, such as acid recovery systems, acid pumps, waste water treatment systems, blowers, chiller and cooling towers, anodizing rectifiers and tanks, anodizing cranes, filter pumps and presses, exhaustion and automatic systems, automatic chemical dosing systems, plate heat exchangers, pneumatic clamping devices, electro coloring transformers, hot water and steam boilers, cooling skids, water conditioning systems, and loading and unloading lifts. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries. Politeknik Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

PRKAB.IS.long_name: Türk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi
PRKAB.IS.summary: TÃ¼rk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi engages in the manufacture, import, export, and trading of cables, conductors, machinery, apparatus, tools and equipment, and spare parts and accessories for energy and telecommunication industries worldwide. The company offers a range of energy cables, including insulated low, medium, and high voltage, as well as building cables; and building, low voltage, and fire resistant cables. It also provides various telecom solutions, such as optical fiber cables and accessories, copper and telephone cables, building and antenna cables, signal and control cables, data center cables, and structured cabling solutions, as well as multimedia solutions comprising industrial communication and coaxial cables, and studio/broadcast and mobile networks solutions. In addition, the company offers nuclear, photovoltaic, ship, rolling stock, railway, airport and elevator runway, control, rubber insulated, and automotive cables. Further, it provides integrated solutions and services for downhole technology, SURF, and core cables. The company offers its products primarily under the Prysmian and Draka brands. The company was formerly known as Turk Pirelli Kablo ve Sistemleri A.S. and changed its name to TÃ¼rk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi in September 2005. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Mudanya, Turkey. TÃ¼rk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Draka Holding B.V.

PRKME.IS.long_name: Park Elektrik Üretim Madencilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
PRKME.IS.summary: Park Elektrik Ãretim Madencilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., through its subsidiary, Konya Ilgin Elektrik Ãretim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., generates and sells electricity in Turkey. It focuses on establishing a thermal power plant with an installed capacity of 500MW in the Ilgin District of Konya. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Park Elektrik Ãretim Madencilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Park Holding A.S.

PRZMA.IS.long_name: Prizma Pres Matbaacilik Yayincilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
PRZMA.IS.summary: Prizma Pres Matbaacilik Yayincilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides printing services. The company prints courses and supplementary textbooks, children's stories and tale books, and question bank and test books. It also engages in various printing works. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

PSDTC.IS.summary: Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. engages in the export of ready-to-wear/ready-made garment products in Turkey. It also provides export intermediation services; and tax and foreign trade consultancy services related to tax, other financial legislations, customs, foreign exchange, export, import, inward processing, factoring, and Exim loans in foreign trade. In addition, the company offers legislation and bulletin services, such as changes and developments in tax and other financial legislation, and foreign trade legislation; and information sharing services, such as information about the seminars, panels, or conferences. Further, it organizes information meetings and panels. The company was formerly known as Pergamos Dis Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. as a result of its merger with Status Dis Ticaret A.S. in 2005. Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. was founded in 2001 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

QNBFB.IS.summary: QNB Finansbank A.S. provides various banking products and services in Turkey. It offers deposit products, including savings, daily yield, gold, and payroll accounts; time and demand deposits; consumer, auto, and mortgage loans; payments services; safe deposit boxes; and various insurance products comprising life, workplace, unemployment, auto, home, professional liability, personal accident, and e-insurance, as well as overdrafts, bank and credit cards, and support products. The company also provides investment products, such as treasury bills and government bonds, bank bills and bank bonds, Eurobonds, mutual funds, capital guaranteed and exchange traded funds, deposits fund, derivatives, and repo and stocks, as well as private portfolio products. In addition, it offers cash management, foreign trade, and corporate banking services; and financial leasing and factoring services, as well as private pension products. Further, the company provides portfolio management, custody, and asset and wealth management; international banking; and merchant services, as well as guarantees and agriculture banking. Additionally, it offers wholesale and commercial banking products, including structured and project finance, transaction banking, financial institutions, treasury, investment banking, and advisory services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 473 domestic branches, one off-shore branch, and one airport branch. The company was formerly known as Finansbank A.S. and changed its name to QNB Finansbank A.S. in January 2018. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. QNB Finansbank A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Qatar National Bank (Q.P.S.C.).

QNBFL.IS.summary: QNB Finans Finansal Kiralama AS provides financial leasing services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers finance leasing services for wind turbines and solar power plants, heavy machinery, automobiles, medical equipment, agricultural equipment, printing equipment, textile equipment, commercial vehicles, real estate, office equipment, manufacturing machines, and technological equipment. It serves corporations and self-employed professionals. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. QNB Finans Finansal Kiralama AS is a subsidiary of QNB Finansbank A.S.

QUAGR.IS.long_name: QUA Granite Hayal Yapi ve Ürünleri Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
QUAGR.IS.summary: Hayal Seramik Yapi ve ÃrÃ¼nleri Turizm Sanayi Ticaret A.S. produces, trades, imports, and exports floor and wall ceramics, floor and wall tiles, sanitary ware, and granite. It offers ceramic, vitrified, granite, and tile raw materials and adhesives. The company also provides granites, such as wood, stone, marble, concrete, monochrome, mosaic, and 20 MM granites. The company sells its products through dealers internationally. Hayal Seramik Yapi ve ÃrÃ¼nleri Turizm Sanayi Ticaret A.S. was founded in 2015 and is based in Aydin, Turkey.

RALYH.IS.summary: Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. operates as a construction company in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Bisas Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S and changed its name to Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. in March 2018. Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

RAYSG.IS.summary: Ray Sigorta Anonim Sirketi engages in the non-life insurance business in Turkey. Its insurance products include accident, health, motor vehicles, air vehicles, water vehicles, transportation, fire and natural disasters, general loss, credit, financial losses, and legal protection; home insurance; and motor third party liability insurance. The company offers its products through agencies, bank branches, brokers, and leasing companies. It serves through 1.303 authorized agencies, 98 agency brances, 50 Alternatif Bank branches, 71 Fibabanka branches, 92 broker, and 9 broker branches. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Ray Sigorta Anonim Sirketi operates as a subsidiary of ATBIH GmbH.

RCAA.SG.summary: ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, sells, services, imports, and exports consumer durable goods and consumer electronics in Turkey and internationally. It operates through White Goods, Consumer Electronics, and Other segments. The company offers built-in and freestanding appliances, such as refrigerators, freezers, washing machines, dryers, dishwashers, ovens, hobs, hoods, warming drawers, microwave ovens, and water dispensers and water filtration appliances; and small household appliances, including vacuum and steam cleaners, kitchen appliances, personal and garment care appliances, and fans. It also provides consumer electronics comprising televisions, computers, smart phones, notebooks and tablets, POS cash registers, Hi-Fi systems, and portable audio systems; and heating and ventilation systems consisting of air conditioners, boilers, and water and room heaters. In addition, the company offers components, which include hermetic compressors, industrial motors, and appliances motor-pumps; and furnitures. It offers its products under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Blomberg, Arctic, Grundig, Altus, Flavel, Elektrabregenz, Leisure, Defy, and Dawlance brands. The company was incorporated in 1955 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

RHEAG.IS.long_name: Rhea Girisim Sermayesi Yatirim Ortakligi A.S.
RHEAG.IS.summary: Rhea Venture Capital Investment Trust Inc is a venture capital investment trust specializing in seed/startup, early, mid venture, middle market, buyouts, PIPEs investments in small and medium enterprises. The fund seeks to invest in healthcare including all areas except hospital services (medical equipment, pharma, distribution, logistics, consumables, IT, laboratories, insurance, and payment systems); telecom, technology including IT, software, hardware, media, internet; infrastructure including energy, waste management, logistics, clean technology; and business services including finance, hospitality, and education. It prefers to invest in Turkey. The fund typically invests between $1 million and $10 million in companies with sales between $5 million and $20 million and EBITDA between $0.75 million and $3 million. It prefers to take a majority stake. However, the fund can also selectively invest with a minority stake. It seeks to hold financial and board level control in its portfolio companies. The fund seeks to exit its investments in five years either through a block sale or an IPO.

RODRG.IS.long_name: Rodrigo Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
RODRG.IS.summary: Rodrigo Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides apparel for men and women; footwear, and accessories for men in Turkey. Its apparel products include T-shirts, polo shirts, shirts, sweats, sweaters, knit wares, jeans trousers, trousers, tracksuits, jackets, raincoats, coats, vests, blouse, skirt, tights, dresses, shorts, bags, and track suits. The company also offers casual and sports shoes; and accessories, including boxers, wallets, belts, socks, bags, shorts, and perfumes. It also operates retail stores, as well as sells online. The company was formerly known as Rodrigo Tekstil Turizm Insaat Gida Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi and changed its name to Rodrigo Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in July 2012. Rodrigo Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1993 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ROYAL.IS.long_name: Royal Hali Iplik Tekstil Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ROYAL.IS.summary: Royal Hali Iplik Tekstil Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells carpets in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Naksan Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Royal Hali Iplik Tekstil Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in December 2007. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Royal Hali Iplik Tekstil Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of NAKSAN Holding.

RTALB.IS.long_name: RTA Laboratuvarlari Biyolojik Urunler Ilac ve Makine Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
RTALB.IS.summary: RTA Laboratuvarlari Biyolojik Urunler Ilac ve Makine Sanayi Ticaret A.S. engages in the research, development, and production of microbiology and molecular biology products in Turkey. It offers microbiology products, including petri dish, tube and bottle, chromogenic media, blood culture bottle, tuberculosis diagnostic, rapid test, microbiological stain, hygislide, surcheck media, membrane, and swab products; and molecular biology products, such as nucleic acid isolation kits, real time PCR kits, and voltran viral load detection systems, as well as diagnovital SARS-CoV-2 multiple, a real-time RT-PCR-based test for the detection of the 2019 novel coronavirus. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Kocaeli, Turkey.

RYGYO.IS.summary: Reysas Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a privately owned real estate investment trust.  It invests in the real estate markets of Turkey. The firm invests in the warehousing market. Reysas Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

RYSAS.IS.long_name: Reysas Tasimacilik ve Lojistik Ticaret A.S.
RYSAS.IS.summary: Reysas Tasimacilik ve Lojistik Ticaret A.S. provides logistics solutions in Turkey and internationally. The company offers local transportation and distribution, automotive logistics, warehousing, railway transportation, fuel logistics, bonded warehousing, and international services. It also provides technology solutions, such as software services and vehicle tracking systems, as well as customer specific applications. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

SAFKR.IS.long_name: Safkar Ege Sogutmacilik Klima Soguk Hava Tesisleri Ihracat Ithalat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SAFKR.IS.summary: Safkar Ege Sogutmacilik Klima Soguk Hava Tesisleri Ihracat Ithalat Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells air conditioners. It offers commercial air conditioners for vehicles, such as minibuses, midi buses, buses, and refrigerators; crank-driven and electrical frigorific systems; light-rail system air conditioners and rail vehicles; and special application air conditioners, as well as air conditioners for the defense industry. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

SAHOL.IS.summary: Haci Ãmer Sabanci Holding A.S. operates primarily in the finance, manufacturing, and trading sectors worldwide. It operates through Banking, Industry, Retail, Cement, and Other segments. The company offers corporate and investment, private, commercial, SME, retail, and international banking services, as well as payment systems, treasury transactions, and insurance brokerage services; and asset management and financial leasing services. It serves through a network of head office, 771 branches, 5,100 ATMs, and 600,000 POS terminals, as well as Internet and mobile banking services, and call center. The company also retails food and non-food products through a network of 634 stores, including 30 hypermarkets, 370 supermarkets, 25 gourmets, 208 mini markets, and 1 franchise market. In addition, it is involved in the retail of technology products through a network of 200 stores, as well as teknosa.com and a mobile application. Further, the company offers white and grey cement products; and clinker and ready-mixed concrete products. Additionally, it provides tire, construction reinforcement, and composite technologies; and buses, trucks, agricultural, and construction vehicles. The company also offers life and non-life insurance products, and pension products; textile products, tourism services, and information technology solutions; sells and services Mitsubishi Motors passenger and commercial vehicles, and spare parts; and distributes construction vehicles, heavy vehicles, and industrial products, as well as operates hotels. In addition, it engages in the electricity production, distribution, selling, and trading business with 3,607 MW installed capacity through hydroelectric, wind, natural gas, solar, and lignite sources. Haci Ãmer Sabanci Holding A.S. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

SAMAT.IS.long_name: Saray Matbaacilik Kagitçilik kirtasiyecilik Ticaret Ve Sanayi A.S.
SAMAT.IS.summary: Saray Matbaacilik KagitÃ§ilik kirtasiyecilik Ticaret Ve Sanayi A.S. produces and sells stationery products in Turkey. The company offers papers, including woodfree offset printing, coated, photocopy, and book papers, as well as paper sheeting services; exercise books, such as PP cover, wire-o-spiral, single spiral, soft cover, spiral binding, stapled binding, glued binding, and hard cover notebooks; and calendars. It also provides a range of services comprising printing preparation, pre-printing, after printing, and post-printing services; and sheet-fed offset, Web offset, and continuous form printing systems. The company offers its products and services under the Yildiz Yayincilik, Vizyon, Papicat, and SRY,BIL brands. It exports its products to England, Sweden, Hungary, Greece, and Israel. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

SANEL.IS.long_name: San-el Mühendislik Elektrik Taahhüt Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SANEL.IS.summary: San-el MÃ¼hendislik Elektrik TaahhÃ¼t Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells electrical panels in Turkey. The company offers LV and MV power capacitors, LV and MV harmonic filter reactors, LV thyristor switching modules, and GE switchgears. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

SANFM.IS.long_name: Sanifoam Sünger Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SANFM.IS.summary: Sanifoam SÃ¼nger Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides insulation and cleaning products. It offers firex, polyester felt, melamine sponge, bondex, and flame retardant polyurethane sponge insulation products. The company also provides cleaning products, such as scrubber sponges, scouring balls and fibers, cleaning cloths, and bath and other sponges; detergents and personal care products; and raw-materials and semi-finished products. Its products are used in automotive, household appliance, sound insulation and acoustic arrangement, industrial insulation, and technical applications. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

SANKO.IS.long_name: Sanko Pazarlama Ithalat Ihracat Anonim Sirketi
SANKO.IS.summary: Sanko Pazarlama Ithalat Ihracat Anonim Sirketi develops, purchases, imports, exports, markets, and sells dyed and non-dyed yarns, and artificial and synthetic fibers in Turkey and internationally. It also engages in the hydrophilic cotton weaving, knitting, and clothing of industrial goods and other textile products. The company offers ring carded and combed, melange, slub, core spun, dyed, core twist, and organic cotton yarns; and knitted fabrics, such as single jersey, rib, interlock, two and three thread fleece, terry and towel, and pique fabrics, as well as knitted fabrics with elasthane. It also provides woven fabrics, including stretch, novelty, and overdyed denim fabrics; sportswear; cotton woven fabrics; cot-stretch fabrics; color woven products; and curduroy fabrics, as well as printed fabrics. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

SARKY.IS.long_name: Sarkuysan Elektrolitik Bakir Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SARKY.IS.summary: Sarkuysan Elektrolitik Bakir Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and trades in electrolytic copper wire, copper, and copper alloys in Turkey. It offers electrolytic copper cathode products; oxygen free and ETP wire rods; DHP and ETP copper billets; bare, tin plated, and nickel plated copper single wires; bare and tin plated, and nickel plated multi wires, as well as bare and tin plated multi wires on braider bobbins; and bare, tin plated, and nickel plated bunched conductors. The company also provides flat wires and profiles, and PV ribbon wires; copper and copper alloy contact wires, and stranded copper and copper alloy conductors; copper tubes and busbars; and copper nuggets. In addition, it manufactures, imports, and exports steel spool packaging materials and machineries; and offers marketing and distribution services, as well as rents properties. The company's products are used in various industries, including electro technique, electronic, motor, communication, power generation and distribution, solar and renewable energy, home appliances, measurement instruments, defense, automotive, chemical, construction, heating, air-conditioning, and sanitary plumbing. It also exports its products to approximately 70 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Darica, Turkey.

SASA.IS.summary: Sasa Polyester Sanayi A.S. produces and sells polyester fibers, yarns, and chips in Turkey and internationally. The company offers specialty polymers and chemicals, including thermoplastic polyester elastomers, dimethyl terephthalates, plasticizers, advanced polymers, polybutylene terephthalate solutions, and polyethylene terephthalate solutions. Its projects include auto showrooms and sale galleries, bank branches, gas stations, hypermarkets and malls, appliance stores, hotels, and telecommunication sectors. Continuing to grow with its strong financial structure and sustainable success strategies, the company's asset size has reached 5,379.854.713-TL by 30.06.2020. With its team of experts in urbanism, Sinpas REIT is focused on investments that create added value. With this approach, it evaluates the living conditions in the regions it invests in and carries out strategies to improve these conditions. Thus, vital quality and quality are increased not only in the housing projects it develops, but also in the circles where the projects are located. Sinpas REIT's activities throughout Turkey lay the foundation for a modern and safe lifestyle. The projects it implements are examples for other companies in the housing sector. Sinpas REIT, which made a difference with the 45 years of sinpas holding's 45-year accumulation in the original projects it developed, will be among the important players of the sector in 2020. The company will continue to develop projects from land acquisition, from residential design to production, sales to marketing, and by increasing its performance in all areas in which it operates.

The Terminal Operations segment operates terminal buildings, car parks, and general aviation terminals. The Catering Operations segment manages food and beverage operations of the terminal for the passengers and the terminal personnel. The Duty Free Operations segment sells duty free goods for the international arriving and departing passengers. The Other segment provides lounge, IT, security and education, and airline taxi services. The company also provides software and system services. It offers time and demand deposits, accumulating accounts, repos, debtors current loans, spot loans, foreign currency indexed loans, consumer loans, automobile and housing loans, working capital loans, discounted bills, overdraft facilities, gold loans, foreign currency loans, Eximbank loans, pre-export loans, ECA covered financing, letters of guarantee, letters of credit, export factoring, acceptance credits, and draft facilities. The company also provides forfeiting, leasing, forwards, futures, salary payments, investment accounts, cheques, safety boxes, tax collections, bill payment, and payment order services, as well as insurance products comprising fire, accident, transportation, engineering, agriculture, health, forensic protection, and loan insurance. In addition, it offers foreign trade transactions, cash management, factoring, credit cards, investment products, leasing, and other banking products to its corporate, commercial, and retail customers. Further, the company provides small business banking services, including overdraft accounts, POS machines, TL and foreign currency deposits, Internet banking and call-center, debit card, and bill payment to enterprises in retail and service sectors. Additionally, it offers capital markets transactions; issues capital market tools; purchases and sells marketable securities; and provides investment consultancy and portfolio management services, as well as invests in marketable debt and equity securities, and gold and other precious metals. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated a network of 933 branches in Turkey, as well as 3 foreign branches located in New York, Bahrain, and Erbil; and 4,247 ATMs. TÃ¼rkiye Vakiflar Bankasi TÃ¼rk Anonim Ortakligi was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

VAKFN.IS.summary: Vakif Finansal Kiralama A.S., together with its subsidiary, Varkif Sigorta Aracilik Hizmetleri Limited Sirketi, provides financial leasing services in Turkey. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Vakif Finansal Kiralama A.S. is a subsidiary of TÃ¼rkiye Vakiflar Bankasi TÃ¼rk Anonim Ortakligi.

VAKKO.IS.long_name: Vakko Tekstil ve Hazir Giyim Sanayi Isletmeleri A.S.
VAKKO.IS.summary: Vakko Tekstil ve Hazir Giyim Sanayi Isletmeleri A.S. designs, manufactures, trades in, and retails ready-to-wear clothes for men and women under the Vakko brand. It offers shirts and ties, handkerchiefs, shoes and bags, monograms, scarves, and couture; home products; and perfumes, as well as wedding designer for women. The company also provides tea, pastries, ice cream, chocolates, and gift cards; organizes special events; and publishes magazines. In addition, it operates two Vakko Bistrot stores in Istanbul. It offers products through its stores, as well as online in Turkey. The company was founded in 1934 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Vakko Tekstil ve Hazir Giyim Sanayi Isletmeleri A.S. is a subsidiary of Vakko Holding A.S.

VANGD.IS.long_name: Vanet Gida Sanayi Iç Ve Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
VANGD.IS.summary: Vanet Gida Sanayi IÃ§ Ve Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the production and selling of various meat products in Turkey. It offers sausage, salami, fried meat, ham, and dried meat products. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

VERTU.IS.long_name: Verusaturk Girisim Sermayesi Yatirim Ortakligi A.S.
VERTU.IS.summary: Verusaturk Girisim Sermayesi Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in bridge financing, recapitalizations, and growth capital investments. The firm prefers to invest in companies based in Turkey. It prefers to invest in incubation, seed, early-mid-late venture, emerging growth, middle market, mature, turnaround, and later stage companies. The firm typically invests in following sectors: telecom, logistics, energy, technology, manufacturing, and mining. The firm prefers to invest through its balance sheet investments. Verusaturk Girisim Sermayesi Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. was founded in 2012 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

VERUS.IS.summary: Verusa Holding A.S. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in recapitalizations, growth capital, restructuring, growth equity, growth stage, and Pre-Initial Public Offering companies. The firm invests in middle market; later stage; mature; turnaround; emerging growth; seed/startup; and early, mid and late venture companies. It typically invests in communication services, software, energy, food, health sector hospitals, chemicals, metals and mining (Bauxite, Gold, Steel). The firm primarily invests in emerging market companies with focus on Turkey. It invests between ?5 million ($0.62 million) and ?100 million ($12.55 million) in preferred equity and in companies having turnover between ?5 million ($0.62 million) and ?400 million ($50.23 million). The firm supports it's investee companies to grow internally and through add-on acquisitions. The firm prefers to seek strong minority positions with substantial shareholder rights or majority investments. It prefers to exit it's investments from 3 to 7 years. It prefers to invest through balance sheet investments. Verusa Holding A.S. was founded in 2006 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

VESBE.IS.long_name: Vestel Beyaz Esya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
VESBE.IS.summary: Vestel Beyaz Esya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures electronics and household appliances in Turkey, Europe, and internationally. The company produces refrigerators, room air conditioning units, washing machines, cookers, dishwashers, water heaters, freezers, and dryers. It also exports its products to 156 countries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Vestel Beyaz Esya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

VESTL.IS.long_name: Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
VESTL.IS.summary: Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells brown and white goods in Turkey. The company operates through three segments: Television and Electronic Devices, White Goods, and Other. The company provides refrigerators, washing machines, tumble dryers, cookers, ovens, water heaters, dishwashers, and air-conditioners. It also offers televisions; set-top boxes (STB); visual solutions; smartphones and tablets; LED lighting; smart home, smart walking stick, smart mirror, integrated television STB, smart test platform, user experience and interface cloud architecture, artificial intelligence, and cyber security solutions; and electric vehicle charging stations. The company markets and sells its products under the Vestel brand name. It sells its products through 976 Vestel stores, 886 Regal sales points, 9 Vs outlets, and online sales stores, as well as through household stores, technology retailers, hypermarkets, and e-commerce sites. The company also exports its products to Europe and internationally. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Zorlu Holding A.S.

VKFYO.IS.long_name: Vakif Menkul Kiymet Yatirim Ortakligi A.S.
VKFYO.IS.summary: Vakif Menkul Kiymet Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. engages in the managing of capital market instruments portfolio in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Vakif B Tipi Menkul Kiymetler Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. and changed its name to Vakif Menkul Kiymet Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. in April 2014. Vakif Menkul Kiymet Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

VKGYO.IS.summary: Vakif Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS is a real estate investment trust. Vakif Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS is based in Turkey.

The company offers toilet papers, paper towels, napkins, facial tissues, wet towels, dispensers, and other products under the Premia, Lily, Senso, Select, and Pufla brands. It also exports its products to 23 countries, primarily to the Europe and Central Asian Republics. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

YATAS.IS.long_name: Yatas Yatak ve Yorgan Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
YATAS.IS.summary: Yatas Yatak ve Yorgan Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells bed, furniture, quilt, armchair, sofa, home textile, and home furniture in Turkey. It also exports its products. The company sells its products under the Yatas brands. It operates 80 retail stores in Turkey. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

YAYLA.IS.short_name: YAYLA EN. UR. TUR. VE INS
YAYLA.IS.long_name: Yayla Enerji Üretim Turizm ve Insaat Ticaret A.S.

The company was incorporated in 1973 and is based in YerkÃ¶y, Turkey. Yibitas Yozgat IsÃ§i Birligi Insaat Malzemeleri Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. is a subsidiary of Votorantim Ãimento Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.

YESIL.IS.summary: Yesil Yatirim Holding Anonim Sirketi provides technical planning, programming, budgeting, project planning, and in relation to financial markets. The company is also involved in real estate valuation services, investment and research activities in the commercial, industrial, and financial areas. In addition, it offers company valuation services. The company is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

YGGYO.IS.long_name: Yeni Gimat Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S.
YGGYO.IS.summary: Yeni Gimat Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a real estate investment trust. Yeni Gimat Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is based in Turkey.

YGYO.IS.summary: Ihlas Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. is a publicly owned real estate investment firm. The firm invests in real estate, real estate projects, real estate backed rights, real estate backed capital market instruments, and capital markets. Ihlas Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi was founded in December 1997 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

YKBNK.IS.summary: Yapi ve Kredi Bankasi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in the Netherlands, Azerbaijan, and Malta. The company operates through two segments, Retail Banking; and Corporate, Commercial, and SME Banking. The Retail Banking segment offers banking products and services, such as card payment systems, general purpose loans, auto loans, mortgages, commercial installment loans, time and demand deposits, gold banking, investment accounts, life and non-life insurance products, and payroll services. This segment also provides mutual funds, foreign exchange, and gold and equity trading services; and personal art, inheritance, real estate, tax, education, and philanthropic advisory services. The Corporate, Commercial, and SME Banking segment offers corporate banking for large-scale, international, and multinational companies; commercial banking for medium-sized enterprises; and SME banking for SME companies. This segment provides working capital finance, trade finance, and project finance, as well as domestic and international non-cash loans, such as letters of credit, letters of guarantee, and cash management services, as well as financial advisory and equity management advisory services. It serves customers through ATMs, telephone banking, Internet banking, and mobile banking. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated through 835 branches and 4,535 ATMs. Yapi ve Kredi Bankasi A.S. was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

YKGYO.IS.long_name: Yapi Kredi Koray Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S.
YKGYO.IS.summary: Yapi Kredi Koray Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S., a real estate investment trust (REIT), engages in the purchase, sale, and rental of real estate properties in Turkey. The company's investment portfolio of properties consists of residential and commercial real estate. It also involves in the project development. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

YKSLN.IS.summary: Yukselen Celik Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells iron and steel products in Turkey, Europe, the Middle East, and North Africa. The company offers carbon, manufacturing, structural, alloy and mon-alloy, tooling stainless, skilled, and unskilled iron and steel products under the DSS, POLDI, TOOLGO, WESS, YÃKSELEN, and ETE brands for use in various industries, including machinery, automotive, formwork, iron and steel, ship, construction, and railway industries. Its products include round steel, flat and square, sheets and plates, hexagon and bright, pipes, special grade products, and forgings. The also imports, exports, buys, and sells iron and steel products. The company was formerly known as Yukselen Celik Ticaret Limited Sirketi and changed its name to Yukselen Celik Anonim Sirketi in January 2013. Yukselen Celik Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

YONGA.IS.long_name: Yonga Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
YONGA.IS.summary: Yonga Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures, sells, and exports furniture in Turkey. The company offers dresser units, dining benches, TV stands, coffee tables, sideboard, bookcases with cupboards, dining tables, side tables, book cases, bench, bookshelf display units, tables, console tables, sofa side tables, tallboy chests and mirrors, highboards, wardrobes, shelving units, beds, desks, storage benches, and bedside and dressing tables. It also provides lamp tables, display cabinets, bureaus, bedside cabinets, table stools, wine racks, trunks, door glazed tops, chest, corner desks, office desks, office filing units, tall glazed units, standalone mirrors, and media units. The company offers its products under the Audely, Duhrer, Shalstone, Bosco, Teramo, Design Project, Sonoma, Colby, and Stockholm names. It also operates in the United Kingdom, the United States, Israel, Australia, and Denmark. Yonga Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1974 and is based in Denizli, Turkey.

YUNSA.IS.long_name: Yünsa Yünlü Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

It offers men's woolen and worsted, women's, fashion trend, and corporate wear fabrics; and upholstery fabrics primarily used in commercial vehicle industry. The company also exports its products to approximately 50 countries. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. YÃ¼nsa YÃ¼nlÃ¼ Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of SÃ¼rmegÃ¶z Tekstil Yatirim A.S.

YYAPI.IS.summary: Yesil Yapi EndÃ¼strisi A.S. operates as a construction company in Turkey and internationally. It undertakes the construction of industrial plants, villas, commercial business centers, hospitals, housing projects, educational buildings, hotels, restoration and renovation projects, shopping malls, and cultural centers. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ZOREN.IS.summary: Zorlu Enerji Elektrik Ãretim A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the generation, distribution, retail trade, and sale of electricity and steam in Turkey and internationally. It also sells and installs solar panels; sells and distributes natural gas; constructs, manages, and maintains EV charging stations; and constructs industrial plants. As of December 31, 2019, the company had total installed capacity of 1,086 MW comprising 305 MW of geothermal energy, 272 MW of wind energy, and 119 MW of hydroelectric energy. It operates 7 hydroelectric, 3 wind, 4 geothermal, and 3 natural gas plants in Turkey; 1 wind farm in Pakistan; and 3 natural gas power plants in Israel. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
